title: Slim Chance
description: It is possible to change--just not always for the better. Evelyn Mays has her hopes pinned on being the perfect bride in a size-eight Vera Wang wedding dress. After all, her boyfriend has just proposed in front of the whole office--so there's a certain image to live up to She just has to transform herself from cuddly brunette to svelte blonde...but changing her appearance tempts her to change everything in her life--including her boyfriend Is Evie discovering her true self, or is she playing a game of chance that will end in trouble?
author: Jackie Rose
